outputs.output_descr:
The project aims to enhance environmental management for sustainable economic growth, poverty reduction, achievement of the millennium development goals and realization of vision 2030.  Mainstream environment in planning and budgeting processes
1.  Improved understanding of pov-erty and environmental linkages within government ministries and institutions, and other stake-holders
2.  Economic assessment of links between environment and natural resource management and Kenya's growth potential conducted.
3.  Government capacity and mechanisms to deliver pro-poor environment policy strengthened.
4.  Tools developed for the integra-tion of environment into develop-ment plans and budget processes
6.  Support to project management
7.  Poverty environment advisory support
